verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"Can a <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H5532>profitable<s%> to <S%H410>God?<s%> <S%H3588>Surely<s%> he who is <S%H7919>wise<s%> is profitable to <S%H5532>himself.<s%>
Is it any <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that you are <S%H6663>righteous?<s%> Or does it <S%H1215>benefit<s%> <S%H1870>him,<s%> that you make your ways <S%H8552>perfect?<s%>
Is it for your <S%H3374>piety<s%> that he <S%H3198>reproves<s%> <S%H935>you,<s%> that he enters with you into <S%H4941>judgment?<s%>
<S%H7451>Isn't<s%> your wickedness <S%H7227>great?<s%> Neither is there any <S%H7093>end<s%> to your <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
For you have taken <S%H2254>pledges<s%> from your <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing,<s%> and <S%H6584>stripped<s%> the <S%H6174>naked<s%> of their <S%H899>clothing.<s%>
You <S%H4325>haven't<s%> given water to the <S%H5889>weary<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and you have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from the <S%H7457>hungry.<s%>
But as for the <S%H2220>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he had the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The honorable <S%H5375>man,<s%> he lived in <S%H3427>it.<s%>
You have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> away <S%H7387>empty,<s%> and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> have been <S%H1792>broken.<s%>
Therefore <S%H6341>snares<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6597>you.<s%> Sudden <S%H6343>fear<s%> troubles <S%H926>you,<s%>
or <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> so that you can not <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H8229>floods<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> cover <S%H3680>you.<s%>
<S%H433>"Isn't<s%> God in the <S%H1363>heights<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven?<s%> <S%H7200>See<s%> the <S%H1363>height<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> how high they <S%H7311>are!<s%>
You <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H410><s%> 'What does God <S%H3045>know?<s%> Can he <S%H8199>judge<s%> through the thick <S%H6205>darkness?<s%>
Thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are a <S%H5643>covering<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> so that he doesn't see. He <S%H1980>walks<s%> on the <S%H2329>vault<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>'
Will you <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H734>way,<s%> which <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden,<s%>
who were snatched <S%H7059>away<s%> before their <S%H6256>time,<s%> whose <S%H3247>foundation<s%> was <S%H3332>poured<s%> out as a <S%H5104>stream,<s%>
who <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493><s%> 'Depart from <S%H7706>us;<s%>' and, 'What can the Almighty do for <S%H6466>us?<s%>'
Yet he <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6098>things,<s%> but the counsel of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is far from <S%H7368>me.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H8055>it,<s%> and are glad. The <S%H5355>innocent<s%> ridicule <S%H3932>them,<s%>
<S%H518>saying,<s%> 'Surely those who rose up <S%H7009>against<s%> us are cut <S%H3582>off.<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> their <S%H3499>remnant.<s%>'
<S%H5532>"Acquaint<s%> yourself with <S%H7999>him,<s%> now, and be at peace. Thereby <S%H2896>good<s%> shall come to <S%H935>you.<s%>
Please <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H8451>instruction<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and lay <S%H7760>up<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
If you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> you shall be built <S%H1129>up,<s%> if you put <S%H7368>away<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from your <S%H168>tents.<s%>
<S%H7896>Lay<s%> your <S%H1220>treasure<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> the gold of <S%H211>Ophir<s%> among the <S%H6697>stones<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks.<s%>
The <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> will be your <S%H1220>treasure,<s%> and <S%H8443>precious<s%> silver to <S%H3701>you.<s%>
For then you will <S%H6026>delight<s%> yourself in the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> and shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H433>God.<s%>
You shall make your <S%H6279>prayer<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> and he will hear <S%H7999>you.<s%> You shall pay your <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
You shall also <S%H1504>decree<s%> a <S%H562>thing,<s%> and it shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> to <S%H216>you.<s%> Light shall <S%H5050>shine<s%> on your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
When they cast <S%H8213>down,<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1466><s%> 'be lifted up.' He will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H7807>humble<s%> <S%H5869>person.<s%>
He will even <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H336>him<s%> who is not <S%H5355>innocent.<s%> <S%H4422>Yes,<s%> he shall be delivered through the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands.<s%>"
